snippet.title: Harder-Early Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: Harder is an action rogue-like game with combat heavily inspired by the hack and slash genre. Progress through a series of enemies and bosses to reach your one true goal. Dodge, dash, parry, and slash your way through angels and demons alike in this quest to kill GOD.

localized.title: Harder-Early Gameplay Trailer
localized.description: Harder is an action rogue-like game with combat heavily inspired by the hack and slash genre. Progress through a series of enemies and bosses to reach your one true goal. Dodge, dash, parry, and slash your way through angels and demons alike in this quest to kill GOD.
